title: Cannot mount on FreeBSD: mount_fusefs: -o timeout=: option not supported
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
When running rclone mount, the following error is outputted: 
2019/10/09 21:36:19 mount helper error: mount_fusefs: -o timeout=: option not supported
I just updated today to the newest version of rclone and this issue started happening. 



#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)
rclone v1.49.4


#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)
FreeBSD 12.0-RELEASE-p10 amd64


####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)
Google Drive


#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
rclone mount -vv --log-file /var/log/rclone.log cachedrive: /mnt/gdrive


#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)
2019/10/09 21:36:19 INFO  : cachedrive: Chunk Total Size: 15G
2019/10/09 21:36:19 INFO  : cachedrive: Chunk Clean Interval: 1m0s
2019/10/09 21:36:19 INFO  : cachedrive: Workers: 4
2019/10/09 21:36:19 INFO  : cachedrive: File Age: 6h0m0s
2019/10/09 21:36:19 DEBUG : Adding path "cache/expire" to remote control registry
2019/10/09 21:36:19 DEBUG : Adding path "cache/stats" to remote control registry
2019/10/09 21:36:19 DEBUG : Adding path "cache/fetch" to remote control registry
2019/10/09 21:36:19 DEBUG : Cache remote cachedrive:: Mounting on "/mnt/gcache"
2019/10/09 21:36:19 mount helper error: mount_fusefs: -o timeout=: option not supported
2019/10/09 21:36:19 Fatal error: failed to mount FUSE fs: mount_fusefs: exit status 1
